subheader: Someone aptly said “If heavy metal bands ruled the world, we had be a lot better off.” and we cannot headbang to it more!
text:
Incandescence 2023 brings you one of the most awaited and biggest metal fests of the country, 'Thundermarch'.
The culmination of face-melting strums, trembling, thunders, and death growls, as the top-notch metal bands across the nation fight it out to the way to ultimate glory.
Get ready to scream at the top of your lungs, cry out all the pent-up anger,  frustration, and suppressed feelings and witness the royal demons of rhythm slaughter their path to grandeur.

Incandescence 2023 presents to you its long awaited night which marks the finale of North East's biggest cultural fest - 'Carpe Diem'. A night which promises to engender an atmosphere of excitement and exuberance, enough to blow your minds out and leave you bedazzled. Extraordinary craze and bass is sure to hit your chest as the music and rhythm penetrates to the core of your being. In the past years, performers like Papon, Prateek Kuhad, The Local Train, Nikhil D' Souza, Gajendra Verma etc have ablazed the stage with their presence. So, get ready to scream and cheer for your favourite musicians and bands, and create some of your best memories!

To welcome someone into the melodic world of Indie, all you need is a ukulele and your singing voice.
INCANDESCENCE 2023 offers you a night with your favourite independent musicians. In the company of your loved ones, experience the incredible aura for yourself. With a cool breeze blowing in your face, we have the ideal talents to drop you into a vibrant and soulful sundowner by the lake. the presence of virtuosos like Prateek Kuhad, Tejas Menon, and Dhruv Vishwanath in the past. You will remember Indie Unplugged for the rest of your lives, without a doubt.

The showstopper event of the INCANDESCENCE 2023 is none other than Nirvana. A night full of music, shayari or poetry in kavi sammelan, stand up comedy in comedy night or to be precise a night full of art is indeed what makes our monotonous lives filled with tremendous glee. With the likes of comics like Karunesh Talwar, Akash Gupta and Aakash Mehta in the comedy night and the legendary Dr. Rahat Indori in kavi sammelan has already graced us with their presence. Also it is a tradition to end the nirvana night with a musical performance and hip hop artist Penny Plan and AsWeKeepSearching, a post-rock/experimental band have made their presence felt with their marvellous performances in the past.
